headline: Welltower upgraded to Buy from Hold at Jefferies
summary: Jefferies upgraded Welltower (WELL) to Buy from Hold with a price target of $147, up from $132. With senior housing operating portfolios “setting up for multiple years of outsized growth,” Welltower is the “premier” senior housing real estate investment trust with 57% net operating income exposure, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm says that in addition to a “strong” macro backdrop, Welltower plans to expand its end-to-end tech platform to additional operators in 2025, enh

headline: Welltower Announces Executive and Senior Leadership Team Promotions
summary: Welltower Inc. (NYSE: WELL) today announced executive and senior leadership team promotions to further solidify its best-in-class team and to strengthen the Company's long-term growth prospects.
